wikipedia_page.main: Francis Joseph McCourt (9 December 1925 – 1 June 2006) was a Northern Irish footballer who played as a wing half for Dundalk, Shamrock Rovers, Bristol Rovers, Manchester City, Colchester United and  Poole Town. He was born in Portadown.McCourt was capped six times by Northern Ireland. He later moved to Washington, U.S.A. and died there in June 2006 at the age of 80.

response: Frank McCourt (1930–2009) was an Irish-American teacher and writer.
